prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with vibrant feathers and a striking crest.
I want a flying-type Pokemon that embodies agility with sleek wings and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon with a distinct color palette of red, yellow, and white, showcasing its elegance in flight.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a majestic falcon, with sharp features and a proud stance.
Imagine a swift, aerial Pokemon that thrives in grasslands, displaying a mix of strength and beauty.
Design a small bird Pokemon that has a colorful tail and a playful personality, perfect for trainers.
Show me a Pokemon that combines grace and tenacity, with a color scheme that includes red and yellow.
